div.p: Second year yāṇṭu iraṇṭāvatu [of the reign] of the glorious Lord, king Rājendra Cōḻa uṭaiyār śrīrācēntiracōḻatēvarkku) alias king Rājakesarivarman kōvirācakēcarivaṉmarāṉaThat is, Kulottuṅga Cōḻa I, as named in inscriptions of the early years of his reign.,
